name: Internals
text: This page is dedicated to the Internals of JRuby and specifications for how we behave: * [[Compiler Packaging and Pathing]] * [[Compiler Name Mangling]] * [[JIT Compiler]] * [[Static Compiler]] * [[Classpath and Load Path]] * [[Require and Load behavior]] * [[Ruby_JRuby Security|Ruby/JRuby Security]] A New Security Implementation to Replace SAFE/TAINT) * [[JRubyMethod_Signatures|JRuby Method Binding]] - How to wire up Java methods in a JRuby extension * [[JRuby Internal Design]]
